dmca.title: TP-C386599U / Re : MinistryofBurlesque.com - Hosted Inffringements # 2
dmca.body:
Web Sheriff
Protecting Your Rights on the Internet
Tel 44-(0)208-323 8013 / Fax 44-(0)208-323 8080
websheriff@websheriff.com  www.websheriff.com

STRICTLY PRIVATE & CONFIDENTIAL
ATTENTION ADDRESSEES ONLY
WITHOUT PREJUDICE
  Dear Legal Response Team,

  With reference to your recent response re' the above, we are obliged to 
remark that your relevant customer's site contains an extensive amount of  
libellous material relating to - inter alia - our clients in this matter (please see 
below for just one, self-evident example) :-

    Posted: Sat Jul 22, 2006 7:47 am
If she's taking aciclovir it's because her dirty white ass is riddled with 
herpes!    
She certainly puts it about. I remember seeing Madeline at Club Noir in
Edinburgh straddling some big fat lesbian who was dressed as a policeman. 
Madelines saggy old-lady titties were flopping out of her bra and were on
show to all passers by. 
But here's where it gets hilarious. 
Her identical twin sister Tina (who runs the club) saw what was going on and
proceeded to drag Madeline off her fat female friend. She then got her sister
in a headlock and dragged her outside the emergency exit door USING
MADELINES HEAD AS A MAKESHIFT BATTERING RAM!!! 
Everyone was then greeted with the sight of two middle-aged twins
(one with her naked tits sagging all over the place like two plastic
shopping bags with oranges at the bottom) having a total bitch fight in
front of everyone! 
The most amazing thing was that Tina seemed to be more concerned that
people would think that it was HER who had been caught lezzing off with
a 20 stone heffer! The argument started off with Tina screaming that her
sister had ruined her reputation and would 'pay dearly for fucking her up'. 
This rapidly degenerated into a total cocaine-fueled slag fight. Both
sisters were pulling each others hair and slapping each other around. 
If they weren't both on the cusp of old age, it could have been
construed as quite erotic. 
Unfortunately, the only person who seemed to be getting
off to the scene was Madelines VERY COKED UP boyfriend Dave. 
The guy had a really creepy leering expression on his face and actually
had his hand in his trouser pocket and looked for all the world like
he was having a surreptitious wank whilst watching his girlfriend and
her twin sister knock seven shades of shit out of each other!!! 
It's unfortunate that Club Noir operate a strict no-camera policy
because this was seen by loads of people and should be recorded on
Fetish Gossip for posterity! 
I'm sure that there are many other classics involving Madeline,
but this has to be my favourite!    
    
  Whilst our clients' consider that your company is both culpable and liable 
for allowing these libels to be published / for de facto publishing them 
(especially following notification of the same), our clients would be prepared to 
forego legal action against The Planet in the event that a written warning was 
issued to this site, cautioning them of their breaches of The Planet's AUP and 
warning of suspension  of hosting services in the event of further breaches.

  We shall look forward to hearing from you as your earliest possible 
opportunity.

  As you will appreciate, this e-mail - containing, as it does, a position 
that is potentially prejudicial to our clients' open / formal position - is 
written on a without prejudice basis and, as such, all of our clients' 
accumulated, worldwide rights in this matter remain strictly reserved.

  Yours sincerely,

  Jack Stevens
  (Enforcement Team)
